statements: SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = '1234';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, payment_method FROM payment_transactions WHERE payment_method = 'credit_card' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 'abc123' ORDER BY transaction_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 'def456' AND payment_method = 'credit'
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND payment_method IN ('credit', 'paypal')
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM payment_transactions
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_time FROM payments WHERE payment_method = 'credit card';
SELECT payment_id, payment_method FROM payments ORDER BY payment_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, account_balance FROM users WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_time DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_time FROM payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY payment_amount ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, account_balance FROM users WHERE account_balance < 0;
SELECT user_id, username, email, account_balance FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, account_balance FROM users WHERE account_balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT method_name, fee FROM payment_methods ORDER BY fee DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'complete' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT method_id, method_name, fee FROM payment_methods WHERE fee < 10 ORDER BY method_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_amount, order_time FROM orders ORDER BY order_amount DESC;
SELECT payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, order_amount, order_time FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_time FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT order_id, transaction_amount, transaction_time FROM orders JOIN transactions ON orders.order_id = transactions.transaction_id ORDER BY transaction_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT user_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT seller_name, location, rating FROM sellers WHERE rating >= 4.0;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT users.user_name, payments.amount FROM users JOIN payments ON users.user_id = payments.user_id WHERE users.email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT sellers.seller_name, transactions.transaction_amount FROM sellers JOIN transactions ON sellers.seller_id = transactions.seller_id ORDER BY transactions.transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM fees WHERE fee_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY fee_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT users.user_name, users.phone_number FROM users WHERE users.user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM payments WHERE amount > 500) ORDER BY user_name ASC;
